Sentece: In a cell-based assay, quinacrine inhibits the conversion of normal host prion protein (PrPC) to PrPSc at a half-maximal concentration of 300 nM.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of quinacrine in the treatment of prion disease.

Sentece: One of these molecules is the antimalarial pyronaridine tetraphosphate (IC50 range of 0.82-1.30 μM against three strains of EBOV and IC50 range of 1.01-2.72 μM against two strains of Marburg virus (MARV)) which is an approved drug in the European Union and used in combination with artesunate.
Title: Pyronaridine tetraphosphate efficacy against Ebola virus infection in guinea pig.
